name: 李旻璁
objective:
請同學用學校的 Microsoft365 登入課程 Teams:
帳號：學號 @cc.ntut.edu.tw
密碼：同入口網站

The course introduces the concepts of mass transfer, diffusion, and unit operations in chemical engineering.
schedule:
Index | Topics | Week #
Part 1. Transport Phenomenon
1. Course Intro (week 1)
2. Models to analyze mass transfer (week 2)
3. Diffusion model (week 3, 4, 5)
4. Mass transfer model (week 7 8)
Part 2. Unit Operation
5. Absorption (week 10 11)
6. Differential distillation (week 12 13)
7. Stage distillation (week 14 15)
8. Computer simulation & Aspen Plus (week 16)
9. Course project (week 17)
materials: Diffusion, Mass Transfer in Fluid Systems, 3rd Edition, by E.L. Cussler
